service.title: PBSService
service.description: This complex type represents a submission to the PBS queue manager.

account.description: Defines the account string associated with the job

begin.description: Declares the time after which the job is eligible for execution

checkpoint.description: Defines the interval at which the job will be checkpointed

destination.description: Defines the destination of the job. The destination names a queue, a server, or a queue at a server

exportAllVariables.description: Declares that all environment variables in the qsub command's environment are to be exported to the batch job

file.description: Path to a file containing a Jinja2 template, describing how the StreamFlow command should be executed in the remote environment

jobName.description: Declares a name for the job. The name specified may be up to and including 15 characters in length. It must consist of printable characters with the first character alphabetic

mailOptions.description: Defines the set of conditions under which the execution server will send a mail message about the job

prefix.description: Defines the prefix that declares a directive to the qsub command within the script file

priority.description: Defines the priority of the job. The priority argument must be a integer between -1024 and +1023 inclusive

rerunnable.description: Declares whether the job is rerunable

resources.description: Defines the resources that are required by the job and establishes a limit to the amount of resource that can be consumed

shellList.description: Declares the shell that interprets the job script

userList.description: Defines the user name under which the job is to run on the execution system

variableList.description: Expands the list of environment variables that are exported to the job

services.description: Map containing named configurations of PBS submissions. Parameters can be either specified as #BSUB directives in a file or directly in YAML format.
